channel.title: Services on Gerardo Gutiérrez
channel.description: Recent content in Services on Gerardo Gutiérrez

item.title: Coffee
item.description: Travel through Colombia in search for coffee, having its constant fragance around the house and knowing how to prepare a gret cup. All those things make every activity more pleasant.

item.title: Data Science
item.description: There is a great deal of data right now, and why not make a big effort to process it… I’ll do it.

item.title: IoT
item.description: It is equally important the data acquiring process as its analysis. Nowadays with so many wearable devices, cars and appliances connected to the interner, we experience a big growth in data. More devices, more data; more data, more happiness.
